articles.author: Times Of India
articles.title: Michel Platini was worth a million, Sepp Blatter tells court
articles.description: Michel Platini "was worth his million" Swiss francs a year, former FIFA president Sepp Blatter insisted Thursday, telling a Swiss court he could not understand why the pair were answering fraud charges.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Australian Jack Miller to join KTM in MotoGP next season
articles.description: Australian Jack Miller will leave Ducati and join MotoGP rivals KTM next season, the Austrian team announced on Thursday. The 27-year-old will replace Portuguese rider Miguel Oliveira to join up with Brad Binder of South Africa.

articles.description: Life Element On Ryugu Asteroid : रिसर्च टीम ने 2020 के आखिर में पृथ्वी पर लाए गए नमूनों में 20 से अधिक प्रकार की अमीनो एसिड की पहचान की है। मीनो एसिड प्रोटीन का शुरुआती बिंदु हैं जो जीवित जीव अपने डीएनए कोड के आधार पर पैदा करते हैं।
